title: 02:14에 멈춘 기록
overview:
At 02:14, all major server logs stopped recording.
At 02:16, the administrator account was deleted.
No alerts were triggered.

metadata.location: Server admin panel / backup log storage

suspects.A: The last person who communicated with the administrator
suspects.B: Has permission to access server settings
suspects.C: No access record on the day of the incident

hints: Suspect A stated: "I was asleep before 02:00."
Suspect B accessed the settings page at 02:10.
Suspect C has no access logs that day.
Backup logs can be manually stopped.
Suspect D stated: "I did not touch the backups."
answer_explanation:
Suspect A's statement conflicts with activity records at 02:12.
Backup logs stopped before main logs.
Administrator deletion occurred after backup interruption.
The contradiction identifies A as the responsible party.
